metadata.name: [RGON] Duke's Item Pack
metadata.description:
This mod adds random item ideas I had to the game. It includes 6+ items . The items can be encountered in devil deal, secret, boss and secret item pools.
Future plans: -Better balancing as of the first version of the mod.In the first version the items are unbalanced due to my inability to find testers. - Synergies for items like Wind-Up Key and Critical hit. -Maybe more items in the future if I have some new ideas.
I have not tested the mod for multiplayer yet, it is possibly buggy.If you find any bugs please let me know.
That's all, hope you enjoy :) [img]https://imgur.com/fzEzAtZ.png[/img] [img]https://imgur.com/g55vxCG.png[/img]
